channel.title: How would I
channel.description: Stop nullers on an allstar source? Tried blocking / ipbanning their ip. HELLPPPP

item.title: How would I
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

kingofkingz:

We’re not a idiot 10 year old coder’s… The blood rune dupe is gone, you cant bank blood runes at all. I NEED AN ANTI NULLER! PLEASE!!

Do speak’s English of you? But yeah, Allstar hasn’t made a tutorial of how to stop, but since it’s wL based it should be pretty similar to the tutorial above. Plus not being able to bank bloods is pretty stupid. Try actually fixing it. (Also he wasn’t referring to your server when he brought up the blood rune duping.)

Read full topic

item.title: How would I
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:6, topic:385174”][quote author=fuery0w link=topic=480936.msg3521458#msg3521458 date=1299435459]

Stop nullers on an allstar source? Tried blocking / ipbanning their ip. HELLPPPP
[/quote]Pretty simple! Stop using Allstar scape and use a better source!

Allstar sucks cock now mate

I’d rather play an Allstar server over Delta now days.[/quote]

Most of them still have blood rune dupe, but some don’t. I just look on server status for fail looking names and join. But yes, Allstar sucks…but if it works for you and you’re learning its all good.

Read full topic
